original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold Zp_lprod. unfold fold_right at 1. unfold Zp_mult. unfold Z_Zp in l. induction l as [| x l' IHl]. - intros _ _. reflexivity. - intros H3 H4. simpl. destruct (H2 x) as (H2a & H2b & H2c). destruct (H2a H3) as (H5a & H5b). rewrite (H5c H3). specialize (IHl (list_has_dup_cons_inv Z_Zp x l' H4) H2). rewrite IHl. rewrite H5c. reflexivity.
